description: When adventure calls, these shorts will go anywhere. Lightweight, comfortable and durable, and the matching belt leaves nothing to chance. This high-performance fabric uses recycled polyester made from PET bottles. Polyester sheds weight and adds durability, elastane increases mobility and merino ensures it retains the anti-odour, temperature regulating properties of merino wool.
name: Mons Royale Drift Shorts - AOP - Mens
